name: frame-crop-art
title: Frame Crop - Discover Art for Your TV
description: Discover & download amazing artwork curated by Frame Crop
author: jsheffers

commands.name: get-random-artwork
commands.title: Get Random Art
commands.subtitle: Frame Crop
commands.description: Get a random artwork from the Frame Crop API

commands.name: get-popular-art
commands.title: Popular Art
commands.subtitle: Frame Crop
commands.description: View popular artwork from the Frame Crop API

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
